text: 4th of July week! We had another hot hot hot week here. Picnic with friends! And swimming in the rain. Emilia creating her own paint by number. All the braids. And this green eyed girl. We went to see the new Jurassic Park! Favorite girl. And 4th of July time. These little cuddle bugs. Threw together a flag cake at the last minute. Time to swim! They can stay in the pool forever. And they beg Eddie to throw them! Why he is 18?! Still in past 8pm. They waited for fireworks! Hockey! This one… he will get me. OG BFF. Obsessed with these colors. And these boys! These three begged for Jeni’s again. Jordan really only likes the cone though. And now I can’t believe were into July. How how how?! Time is flying.
html:
4th of July week!

We had another hot hot hot week here.

Picnic with friends!

And swimming in the rain.

Emilia creating her own paint by number.

All the braids.

And this green eyed girl.

We went to see the new Jurassic Park!

Favorite girl.

And 4th of July time.

These little cuddle bugs.

Threw together a flag cake at the last minute.

Time to swim!

They can stay in the pool forever.

And they beg Eddie to throw them!

Why he is 18?!

Still in past 8pm. They waited for fireworks!

Hockey!

This one… he will get me.

OG BFF.

Obsessed with these colors.

And these boys!

These three begged for Jeni’s again.

Jordan really only likes the cone though.

And now I can’t believe were into July.

How how how?! Time is flying.
